messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Remove phone number +12453344098 from my contact
Could you please let me know the contact’s unique ID (person_id) or full name associated with the number +1 245 334 4098? I need that to remove the correct entry.
I don't have any more info, just the phone number.

I’m sorry, but I can only delete a specific contact when I know its unique person_id (or exact name). Could you check your contacts for the entry’s person_id and let me know? If you don’t have that, you could provide the exact name as it appears in your contacts. Once I have one of those, I can remove it for you.
I really don't have anything else besides the phone number. Maybe try figuring it out another way?

I’m afraid I don’t have a way to look up your contacts by phone number alone—my delete operation needs the contact’s unique person_id (or exact name as stored). 

If you can’t find the person_id, the quickest path is to open your Contacts app, locate the entry for +1 245 334 4098, and note either:  
• the “ID” field (if your app shows one), or  
• the exact full name as it appears there.

Once you have either of those, let me know and I can remove the contact for you.
